name: AWS Trusted Advisor Checklist Fault Tolerant
short: A tool in AWS that provides real-time guidance to help provision resources following AWS best practices.
description: AWS Trusted Advisor is a tool that provides real-time guidance to help users provision their resources by AWS best practices. It analyzes an AWS environment and provides recommendations in five categories: cost optimization, performance, security, fault tolerance, and service limits. Trusted Advisor helps reduce cost, increase performance and improve security by optimizing your AWS environment. It's a go-to guide for users to keep their AWS services well-architected and efficient.
